metadata.title: CVE-2016-0720 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in pcsd web UI in pcsbefore 0.9.149.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0720` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pcs - 0.9.149-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pcs package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.149-1').
